ygData.subject: Re: Ranger-Instill Doubt
ygData.msgSnippet: As a follow up-- I ve recently read that Verant can not allow us to stack things with charges. Therefore, in the near future at least, things like poisons and
ygData.messageBody:
As a follow up-- I've recently read that Verant
can not allow us to stack things with charges.
Therefore, in the near future at least, things like poisons
and caster spells will not stack. My question is
then, who are shammys able to stack potions??? Aren't
they items with charges???<br><br>As for poison
components-- they are much more difficult and spread out than
spell research components. I have played a mage and a
chanter, and have known that I could spend some time in a
certain place (unrest, Oasis, etc) to get a good amount
of the words/pages i need for various level spells.
And I was always able to group in rather populated
zones to get the items. <br><br>Rogues, on the other
hand, need to go to some out of the way places to get
some of the components. (Not many people hanging out
in lavastorm killing imps, drakes and basalisks).
The only consolation is that some components can be
bought, BUT the different vendors are quite spread out--
the most important one being in the middle of nowhere
in WK.<br><br>I had a 23 rogue who was pretty good a
poison making, but turned away from the server he was on
to be with friends. I've since started over with a
rogue (one of my favorite classes), and am on my way to
poison level. Can't wait to start mass producing blind,
snare, root, DD, DOT and other
poisons!!!<br><br>Rumbl<br>18th level rogue<br>Xev
